name: docling-v2
description: Advanced Document Q&A Platform with AI-powered chat capabilities

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
